attributes.action: June 2014 European Election Day perfect for Referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Some Labour and Conservative MPs are suggesting a in or out referendum be held on the General Election day.2015  this would be wrong because
Scotland vote on staying in the union in late 2014
to give Scotland a clear view of were the Country
is going in Europe a vote on in or out referendum
people will be considering Europe on June 2014
Election Day perfect for the Scots to have a clear view
